title: Business & Analytics Case Studies
short_summary: Collection of independent analytics and business case studies across domains
summary: A curated collection of standalone analytics and business case studies designed to demonstrate structured problem solving, data analysis, and decision-making across multiple domains. Each case study addresses a specific business question, applies analytical techniques, and delivers actionable insights supported by data.

components.name: Case Study Collection
components.objective: Demonstrate structured analytical problem-solving across diverse business scenarios
components.business_value: Shows the ability to frame ambiguous problems, analyze data, and communicate insights clearly
